recipes.name: Chicken Tikka Masala
recipes.description: A spicy and creamy Indian chicken dish with tomato-based sauce.
recipes.instructions: Marinate chicken, cook in sauce with spices, simmer until done.

recipes.name: Classic Caesar Salad
recipes.description: A fresh salad with romaine lettuce, croutons, and Caesar dressing.
recipes.instructions: Toss lettuce with dressing, add croutons and cheese.

recipes.name: Beef Tacos
recipes.description: Ground beef tacos with traditional toppings in soft corn tortillas.
recipes.instructions: Cook beef with seasoning, assemble with toppings in tortillas.

recipes.name: Avocado Toast
recipes.description: Creamy avocado on toasted bread, topped with seeds and spices.
recipes.instructions: Toast bread, spread avocado, add toppings to taste.

recipes.name: Chocolate Chip Cookies
recipes.description: Classic chewy cookies loaded with chocolate chips.
recipes.instructions: Mix ingredients, form cookies, bake at 350°F for 10-12 minutes.

recipes.name: Beef Stroganoff
recipes.description: A rich and creamy Russian dish with tender beef and mushrooms.
recipes.instructions: Sauté beef and mushrooms, add sour cream sauce, and serve over noodles.

recipes.name: French Onion Soup
recipes.description: A classic French soup made with caramelized onions and topped with melted cheese.
recipes.instructions: Caramelize onions, add broth, and top with cheese before broiling.

recipes.name: Sushi Rolls
recipes.description: Japanese sushi rolls made with rice, seaweed, and fresh fish or veggies.
recipes.instructions: Spread rice on nori, add fillings, and roll tightly. Slice and serve.

recipes.name: Vegetable Stir-Fry
recipes.description: A quick and healthy stir-fry with fresh vegetables and a savory sauce.
recipes.instructions: Sauté veggies in garlic and ginger, add sauce, and cook until tender.
